name: Angela Reasoner
text: I had the incorrect address linked to my online order.  Garrett addressed my issue immediately! He was friendly and understanding!  Thank you for the outstanding customer service, Garrett!

name: Gage Swanke
text: Ordered Delivery. Came on time. Pizza was cooked to perfection. Toppings were liberal. 10/10

name: Matthew Wietzema
text: Very good over the phone. Excellent delivery time. The worker Ben very personable very polite over the phone. Have been physically at location before no complaints there either. Excellent Buffet. Me and my mother where both very impressed with the quality of the food as well as the workers. Will definitely have repeat business.

name: debbieann compson
text:
The salad bar and pizza is great. And the people that work there is amazing.
Thanks Anna and the crew you are all amazing.

name: Todd Braun
text: The food and service are good and it is a good value for lunch.  The facility and decor are getting dated and worn.

name: Lorna Bohjanen
text: Employees were courteous fast and efficient. Pizza's done right on time. They even checked pizza's to make sure things matched on the slips. Very informative about all deals. Will recommend to all to get carry out at 19th Ave N Fargo ND Pizza Hut!

name: clint cermak
text: Excellent Buffet. Clean and a great selection of pizza available.  Good service and very affordable!

name: triquest US
text: Great service today!  Ordered the meat lovers pizza.   Best ml pizza I've had anywhere.

name: Julie McColm
text: It was great. We had 3 adults and 4 children to feed. All had pizza, breadsticks, pop, 2 salad bars and all for a very reasonable price. It tasted very good. Great service.

name: kevin reitmeier
text: Geat food and great service. Plus it just feels like a pizza place should.

text: Very kind and friendly.  Know my mother in law and special needs son very well. You people rock....

name: Kyle Benson
text: The 19th Avenue location over charges for sub par product and get very rude when called out on it.  Don't waste your time or money on them. I'd give them negative stars if I could.

name: S Norm
text: Stacey is a great server. Always smiling!!!

name: MK Lentz
text: June 2018, 4pm, the cheesy bread was the best we've ever had from anywhere.  We ordered 2 medium pizzas made special for us and they were excellent.  I've had the buffet for years and it's always been good. Prices are usually lower here than anywhere else.

name: Susan Poole
text: Great pizza! We ordered to go after visiting someone at the VA hospital. Took a chance and asked if we could eat it in the restaurant, and they VERY graciously accommodated us so we didn't have to sit in the car. Impressed!

name: Danny Aubol
text: Holy moly best pizza deal or even lunch deal in town for the buffet it's the just cannot be beat no one out pizzas the hut

text: Great price for Buffett. Decent selection of pizza a little skimpy in the cheese. Service was excellent.

name: John Smith
text: The food was good but the selection was very limited.

name: Michael Fjelstad
text: The best pan pizza I've had in years.  I asked the lady that waited on us to cook it well done and she did.  Great service, and great food.

text: We always get the meat lover's pizza! It's so flavorful!
